text: Renting is very common in China as house prices are very high, whereas rent is reasonable.The word rent (租) can be found in lots of words such as taxi (出租车).小明：看好了，在学校北门附近。房子有一间卧室、一间客厅和一个厨房，挺好的。小红：Have you checked the house out?小明：Yes, it is near the school’s north gate. It has a bedroom, living room and a kitchen. It’s great.小明：Because the rent is a bit expensive, 1000 yuan per month.小红：It is a bit expensive, let’s keep looking.
